content: aava heidi alander i know a lovely dog called aava she has the most adorable speckled paws when i saw this yarn i knew instantly that i had to work speckled socks for me too © heidi alander 2017 for personal use only photos tiina rammo www sadelmaknits com yarn miss mothballs soft sock 80% merino 20% nylon 100 g / 400 m 1 skein color birch bark needles 2 5 mm or to get gauge gauge 33 sts and 48 row / 10 cm in stockinette stitch notions stitch markers yarn needle blocking materials notes both socks are worked mostly identically but positioning of the lace panel determines left and right sock so there are different instructions in some places of the pattern when there is only one instruction it is for both socks abbreviations st s stitch es k knit p purl rs -right side ws wrong side tbl through the back loop ssk slip slip knit p2tog purl 2 sts together k2tog knit 2 sts together pm place marker sl slip © heidi alander 2017 for personal use only photos tiina rammo www sadelmaknits com cuff & leg gusset & foot cast on 64 sts join to work in rounds using needle which is now holding heel sts needle 1 pick up cuff round * k1tbl p1 * repeat to end and knit 15 sts from the heel flap edge and 1extra st between heel and instep instep continue working according to the chart repeat cuff round a total of 10 times between markers and working stockinette st on other sts pick knit 1 round up and knit 1 st between instep and heel and then 15 sts from the heel flap edge knit 10 sts from the heel to this needle next round left sock k16 pm work next 16 sts according to the needle 4 chart pm k to end next round right sock pm work next 16 sts according to 32 instep sts and 52 sole sts the chart pm k to end round 1 knit through sts on needle 1 until 3 sts left k2tog k1 instep work according to the chart continue as established until chart rnds 1-6 have been worked a between markers and working stockinette st total of times or until leg is desired length on other sts on needle 4 k1 ssk k to end round 2 work according to the chart between markers and working stockinette st on other sts heel repeat row 1-2 until 64 sts left 32 sts for instep and 32 sts for sole 16 sts per needle heel flap heel is worked with 32 sts other stitches are left on hold for continue working as established without decreases until sock is instep 4 cm shorter than desired length stop working after round 6 turn next row sl1 p31 toe next row * sl1 k1 * repeat to end of row work last 2 row a total of 15 times round 1 needles 1 and
